summary:
Tired of swinging those swords repeatedly? or just wanna waste everything within your sight for fun?
Here is a perfect weapon for you!
descriptionHtml:
Slashcore Death Beam is a spell that emits a beam so powerful that it can wipe out a whole nation with a single cast.
The spell has a very high damage, DOESN'T SPEND MAGICKA and kills instantly. All for your slaying pleasure!

[color=#ffff00][size=3]Just unzip the file and copy to your Data folder.[/size][/color]

[color=#ffff00][size=3]How to get it.
[/size][/color]Since it's in Beta you have to acquire it using Console Command.
Hit the tilde (~) key then type the following:
[size=4] "[color=#ffff00]help slashcore"[/color]  [/size][size=3](without quotation marks)[/size]
[size=4]then [color=#00ffff]look for the ID number of the book.[/color] [color=#ffff00] NOT THE SPELL! [/color] then type
[color=#ffff00]player.additem  [book ID number]  1[/color].[/size]
[size=3]then activate the book and select the spell from MAGIC under Destruction menu.

Refer to this image :

 [img]https://s8.postimg.cc/we3r82fjp/TESV_2018-08-13_14-30-47-07.jpg[/img][/size]


Known bugs (so far): Brynjolf of the Thieves Guild is not affected by the beam. I don't know the reason. 
Maybe you guys can help me resolve this. your feedback is important. Thanks!

Best to use with Killable mods.

Troubleshoot:
If you're using SKSE launcher and the mod doesn't work. Try using Skyrim default launcher then perform the instructions mentioned above. 
If the spell is acquired successfully, save the game and restart Skyrim using SKSE launcher.
author: DeathMaidenRye
